name: Slim Fit Men's Suit
description: In need of that special something for a suitably special occasion? Look no further than our, well, latest suit jacket by Ted Baker. Featuring a comfortable wool blend and slim fit in black Panama, this piece is styled with a two button fastening, notch lapel and four-button cuffs. Ready to amp up your game? Do it in style with this Ted Baker piece and let the compliments roll in. 88% Wool 8% Polyester 4% Elastance

name: Floral Print Summer Dress
description: Chiffon midi dress with puff sleeves and stunning embroidery detail on the yoke and sleeves, designed in collaboration with the V and A. Outer 100% Polyester. Inner 100% Polyester. Trim 100% Viscose. Embroidery 68% Polyester, 32% Metallised fibre.

name: Classic Denim Jacket
description: WARDROBE STAPLE. Come rain or shine, a classic denim jacket will always have your back. This stylish take on a wardrobe staple is designed to complete any look. Best of all, it will never go out of style.

name: Striped Knit Sweater
description: This sweater features a relaxed oversized fit and a stretchy rib knit. It has a rounded neckline and wide long sleeves. This sweater comes in stripe. 50% Viscose, 25% Polyester, 20% Polyamide, 5% Elastane

name: Casual Linen Shirt
description: Our linen blend shirt is a versatile addition to your seasonal wardrobe. Made from a soft fabric blend for comfort, this shirt is designed in a flattering length that can be worn tucked in or untucked. With a button-down collar, front button placket and chest pocket. Machine washable. 54% Linen, 46% Cotton.
